ygData.subject: Re: Archery (long)
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, isn t the Trueshot Longbow a ranger only item?   You are correct. My error was that it is not a No Drop item and can be
ygData.messageBody:
<snip>
Well, isn't the Trueshot Longbow a ranger only item?
<snip>

<smacks forehead>
You are correct. My error was that it is not a No Drop
item and can be sold and traded. I slipped on some dwarf
blood earlier and bonked my head. I feel much better
now though. :)

--
Cronik
Servant of Thule the Pain Bringer
6th Season Troll SK
Bertoxxulous

"Greenbloods jus be Froglok trick. Smash'm and they
blood same color a Froglok. Me smash'm Greenblood
for Thule. Thule make Cronik big feared. Make
smash'm fun."
